name: Pigs N Stumps
description:
A puzzle game where you must direct pigs to like-colored cupcakes

This game was made in a week. You have to click on the stumps to turn them towards cupcakes of the right color. A pig will automatically eject from the stump when the stump faces a cupcake of the same color. The puzzle is over when all cupcakes are eaten.

Secondary color pigs can eat secondary colored cupcakes, as well as the primary colors that make up their secondary color. 
Example, a green pig can eat blue, yellow, and green cupcakes.

I like this mechanic. I may reuse it in future projects.
